_header: Believe in God that all hath wrought
_description: On the cardinal virtues — in couplets

BLHar1706.First Lines: Byleue in god þat alle haþ wrouȝteHeuene and erþe and alle of nouȝte…
BLHar1706.Last Lines: …Dyuyne vertuose men þese þre calleThey be moste hyȝe of oþer al
BLHar1706.Note:
Four couplets on the Three Theological Virtues, with
                    ‘Fides’, ‘Spes’, and
                    ‘Caritas’ in right margin beside lines 1, 3, 5.
BLHar1706.Attributed Title: Tres virtutes theologice (rubric heading preceding first line, f. 208)
BLHar1706.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 1706.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?index=0&ref=Harley_MS_1706.

Ushaw28.First Lines:
Beleue in god þat alle hathe wroughtheuen & erthe &
                    alle of nought…
Ushaw28.Last Lines:
…þies ben foure virtues cardinalleþat shulde rewle
                    men bothe grete and smalle
Ushaw28.Note:
Nine couplets on the seven cardinal virtues, included in Speculum
                        Cristiani, tercia tabula.
Ushaw28.Attributed Title:
De septem virtutibus principalibus de quibus… (f.
                        55v); Incipit speculum cristiani (f. 4)
